 * Programmer: Cameron Rodriguez
 * Date: July 6, 2017
 * Program Description: This program will list off details about the programmer, including his name,
 * colour, and his favourite sport.
 */
public class AboutMeRodC {
  
  /**
   * @param args the command line arguments
   */
  public static void main(String[] args) { 
    System.out.println("Hello! My name is Cameron Rodriguez, and I am the creator of this program!");
    System.out.println("Here are just two things about myself.");
    System.out.println("");
    System.out.println("My favourite colour is blue, although I don't prefer any specific shade of it.");
    System.out.println("My favourite sport is karate, which I have been doing for nearly 9 years.");
    System.out.println("");
    System.out.println("Hopefully you got to know me a bit better. Thanks for checking out my program!");
  }
  
  /* ADD YOUR CODE HERE */
  
}
